mapper.select: SELECT u.id as user_id,u.name as name,u.avatar_location as avatar_location,c.post_id as post_id,c.date_created as date_created,c.hit_count as hit_count,c.body as body FROM comment c,user u WHERE c.post_id =#{postid} AND c.user_id = u.id ORDER BY c.date_created

SELECT p.id as postid,c.date_created as commentdate,p.title as posttitle,c.body as commentbody FROM comment c,post p WHERE c.user_id = #{userid} AND c.post_id = p.id GROUP BY p.id ORDER BY c.date_created DESC limit 10
